name: Scrambled Eggs With Veggies
recipe: Saute veggies of your choice until tender. Whisk eggs with salt and pepper. Add eggs to veggies and cook a couple more minutes.

name: Oatmeal With Fruit And Honey
recipe: Cook oatmeal with milk or water (can do 50/50). Added fruit and honey to taste.

name: Polenta
recipe: Cook polenta. Mix with diced green onions and cheddar cheese. Move half into a casserole dish. Add a layer of black beans and a layer of your favorite salsa. Cover with remaining polenta. Bake for 40 minutes until browned.

name: Salad Under The Tuscan Sun
recipe: Add sun-dried tomatoes, sliced avocado, tofu and dijon mustard vinegrette to a salad mix of your choice.

name: Split Pea Soup
recipe: Mix 4 cups stock with 8oz split peas. Add diced potato, carrots and onions. Cook in the Instant Pot on manual for 15 minutes.
